Shopping Cart: A letter with further instructions will be sent to your email.
Корзина: Письмо с дальнейшими инструкциями будет отправлено на ваш адрес электронной почты.

Shopping Cart: You added %1 to your shopping cart.
We can't add this item to your shopping cart right now.
Корзина: Мы не может добавить этот элемент в корзину прямо сейчас.

Shopping Cart: Please select at least one product to add to cart
Корзина: Please select at least one product to add to cart

Shopping Cart: The quote item isn't found. Verify the item and try again.
Корзина: The quote item isn't found. Verify the item and try again.

Shopping Cart: The coupon code "%1" is not valid.
We cannot apply the coupon code.
Корзина: Мы не можем использовать код купона.

Shopping Cart: %1 was updated in your shopping cart.
Корзина: %1 было обновлено в вашей корзине покупок.

Shopping Cart: We can't update the item right now.
Корзина: Мы не можем обновить элемент прямо сейчас.

Shopping Cart: Something went wrong while saving the page. Please refresh the page and try again.
Корзина: Something went wrong while saving the page. Please refresh the page and try again.

Shopping Cart: We can't update the shopping cart.
The order wasn't placed. First, agree to the terms and conditions, then try placing your order again.
Корзина: The order wasn't placed. First, agree to the terms and conditions, then try placing your order again.

Shopping Cart: Something went wrong while processing your order. Please try again later.
Корзина: Во время обработки вашего заказа что-то пошло не так. Пожалуйста, повторите попытку позже.

Shopping Cart: An unspecified error occurred. Please contact us for assistance.
Корзина: An unspecified error occurred. Please contact us for assistance.

Shopping Cart: Please provide CAPTCHA code and try again
Корзина: Please provide CAPTCHA code and try again

Shopping Cart: The product wasn't found. Verify the product and try again.
Корзина: The product wasn't found. Verify the product and try again.

Shopping Cart: We found an invalid request for adding product to quote.
Корзина: We found an invalid request for adding product to quote.

Shopping Cart: We don't have some of the products you want.
Корзина: У нас нет некоторых товаров, которые вы хотите.

Shopping Cart: We don't have as many of some products as you want.
Корзина: У нас нет так много продуктов, как вы хотите.

Shopping Cart: We adjusted product quantities to fit the required increments.
Корзина: Мы скорректировали количество товаров, чтобы соответствовать требуемым приращениям.

Shopping Cart: This quote item does not exist.
Display number of items in cart
An error occurred on the server. Please try to place the order again.
Корзина: Произошла ошибка на сервере. Пожалуйста, попробуйте повторить размещение заказа.

Shopping Cart: A server error stopped your order from being placed. Please try to place your order again.
Корзина: A server error stopped your order from being placed. Please try to place your order again.

Shopping Cart: The shipping information was unable to be saved. Error: "%message"
Корзина: The shipping information was unable to be saved. Error: "%message"

Shopping Cart: The shipping information was unable to be saved. Verify the input data and try again.
Корзина: The shipping information was unable to be saved. Verify the input data and try again.

Shopping Cart: Carrier with such method not found: %1, %2
Корзина: Перевозчик с таким методом не найден: %1, %2

Shopping Cart: The shipping method is missing. Select the shipping method and try again.
Корзина: The shipping method is missing. Select the shipping method and try again.

Shopping Cart: The shipping address is missing. Set the address and try again.
Корзина: The shipping address is missing. Set the address and try again.

Shopping Cart: The shipping method can't be set for an empty cart. Add an item to cart and try again.
Корзина: The shipping method can't be set for an empty cart. Add an item to cart and try again.

Shopping Cart: Totals calculation is not applicable to empty cart
Корзина: Расчет итогов не применим к пустой корзине

Shopping Cart: The customer address is not valid.
There are more than one shipping addresses.
Корзина: Существует болше чем один адрес доставки.

Shopping Cart: Sorry, guest checkout is not available.
Корзина: Sorry, guest checkout is not available.

Shopping Cart: You must confirm your account. Please check your email for the confirmation link or click here for a new link.
Корзина: Вы должны подтвердить свою учетную запись. Пожалуйста, проверьте адрес электронной почты для подтверждения или нажмите здесь для новой ссылки.

Shopping Cart: You have no items in your shopping cart.
Корзина: You have no items in your shopping cart.

Корзина: You added %1 to your shopping cart.

Корзина: My billing and shipping address are the same

Корзина: Вы можете создать учетную запись после оформления заказа.

Корзина: You already have an account with us. Sign in or continue as guest.

Корзина: Вы можете отслеживать статус заказа, создав учетную запись.

Корзина: Sorry, no quotes are available for this order at this time

Корзина: Если вы считаете, что это правильный вариант, вы можете игнорировать это уведомление.
